content:
<python>
search_results = search_pages("Quran peace to you your Lord has made mercy incumbent upon Himself")
if search_results:

    sections = view_sections(page_id)

        content = read_section(section['section_id'])
        if "Peace to you! Your Lord has made mercy incumbent upon Himself" in content:
            print(content)
else:
